summary: REQ-1 appears implemented via new projection logic and BudgetPlanner updates including Recharts line/pie chart imports and input-responsive recommendations. Several other requested items are either not evidenced or contradicted by the diff summary (blogs remain short problem/solution cards; sidebar remains violet gradient; no evidence of global background theme change; no evidence of updating REQ-10 quiz documentation; quiz expansion to 100+ is not verifiable from the truncated questions file and no quiz-UI/progress evidence is shown). The diff also introduces multiple unrelated features/pages not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Increase the quiz question library to at least 100 unique finance quiz questions and ensure the app actually uses them (totalQuestions >= 100 shown in UI), covering the specified topics.
missing_requirements.reason: The questions file is truncated and does not provide evidence that 100+ unique questions exist (unique IDs/prompts) or that the quiz UI initializes/reflects totalQuestions >= 100; no quiz flow/UI files are shown as changed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace Blogs page content with 15+ new SEO-focused long-form posts (800+ words each) covering the specified topics; remove all remnants of previous short problem/solution entries.
missing_requirements.reason: The blog page is described as showing exactly 15 static Problem→Solution entries in a card grid, which conflicts with the requirement for 15+ long-form (800+ words each) posts and explicitly indicates the short problem/solution format remains.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/pages/FinanceBlog.tsx": "Public blog page displaying exactly 15 static Problem→Solution finance entries...")

missing_requirements.requirement: Update overall background styling to remove purple/violet/blue-heavy look and apply a new creative advanced theme consistently across public and authenticated pages.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence shows global/background theme changes; the private layout is still described as using a violet gradient background, suggesting the old theme remains at least in authenticated areas.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx": "...violet gradient background (from violet-600 to violet-800)...")

missing_requirements.requirement: Restyle authenticated sidebar to be dark with green hover effects for navigation items, preserving navigation structure and active-state clarity.
missing_requirements.reason: The authenticated sidebar is described as having a violet gradient background with white text; there is no evidence of a dark sidebar or green hover effects.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx": "...responsive sidebar navigation featuring violet gradient background...")

missing_requirements.requirement: Update internal requirement documentation `frontend/src/requirements/REQ-10-quiz-no-changes.md` so it no longer instructs developers to avoid quiz question additions for this build.
missing_requirements.reason: No change to the specified requirements document is shown in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded multiple non-requested finance app modules and pages (Dashboard/Analytics/Transactions/ExpenseLog) with extensive charting, transaction CRUD, and monthly grouping.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on Budget Planner enhancements, quiz expansion, blogs replacement, and theme/sidebar styling; it does not request a full transaction system overhaul or additional analytics dashboards.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded an 'AI Financial Intelligence' page describing multiple ML models (Linear Regression, GRU, LSTM) and risk analysis content.
hallucinated_features.reason: No AI/ML model feature expansion is requested; the request explicitly targets budget planner visuals/guidance, quizzes, blogs, and styling.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/pages/AIInsights.tsx": "...3 focused ML models (Linear Regression, GRU, LSTM)...")

hallucinated_features.description: Added cookie-consent and cookie-policy functionality (banner, policy page) and related compliance-oriented content.
Added a deployment/SSL troubleshooting guide page.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/pages/DeploymentInfo.tsx": "Comprehensive SSL certificate issue resolution guide...")

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified React Query hooks with mock localStorage implementations and AI training/prediction mutations.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest and goes beyond the specified scope.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts": "React Query hooks with mock localStorage implementations...")
